SQLTest.TestStatement: SELECT PRD_DEFAULT_VALUE FROM SYS_PREFERENCE_DEFINITION WHERE PRD_KEY = 'sys.state';
SELECT 'true' FROM DBVersion where history not like '%797.72%';

SQLDocument.SQLStatement: update DBVersion set history = concat(history,',797.72') where history not like '%797.72%';

UPDATE VIEW_TEMPLATE SET VWT_VIEW_DEFINITION = '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <template> <tab name="Attributes"> <row> <column> <property id="relIepStdOid.stdViewName" label-short="false" /> /> </cell> <cell align="left" border="none" cell-span="10" line-span="1"> <property alias="focus-standards-grdLvlExp" label-display="right" label-short="false" /> </cell> </line> <line border="none"> checkbox-id="focusstandardsother" label-display="hide" label-short="false" /> </cell> <cell align="left" border="none" cell-span="10" line-span="1"> <property alias="focus-standards-common-core" label-display="right" label-short="false" /> </cell> </line> </block> </row> <row> <block> <line align="center" border="bottom" shaded="true"> <text bold="true" font-size="large">Measurable Annual Academic or Functional Goals</text> </line> <line border="none"> <spacer height="20" /> </line> <line border="none"> <cell border="none" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <embedded-list detail-context="iep.igl.detail" extended-dictionary-oid="ddxRiIep" id="goals" popup-height="600" popup-width="800" relationship="relIepIglOid" selection-type="multiple"> <system-value field="iglStdOID" source="ancestor" value="iepStdOID" /> <field id="iglIdentifier" sort="true" /> <field alias="goal-area" sort="true" /> <field id="iglBaseline" /> <field id="iglGoal" /> </embedded-list> </cell> </line> </block> </row> </tab> <tab name="Considerations"> <row> <block> <line align="center" border="bottom" shaded="true"> <text bold="true" font-size="large">Considerations</text> </line> <line border="none" shaded="true"> <cell border="bottom" cell-span="14" line-span="1" shaded="true"> <text /> </cell> <cell border="left,bottom" cell-span="1" line-span="1" shaded="true"> <text bold="true">Yes</text> </cell> <cell border="bottom" cell-span="1" line-span="1" shaded="true"> <text bold="true">No</text> </cell> <cell border="left,bottom" cell-span="10" line-span="1" vertical-align="top" shaded="true"> <text /> </cell> </line> <line border="none"> <cell border="none" cell-span="14" line-span="1"> <text>In developing the IEP, did the IEP team consider:</text> </cell> <cell border="left" cell-span="2" line-span="1" vertical-align="top"> <text /> </cell> <cell border="left,bottom" cell-span="10" line-span="5" vertical-align="top"> <text>If the IEP team cannot answer yes to each of these questions a-d, the team must review that factor and consider the impact of the general factor when developing this IEP</text> </cell> </line> <line border="none"> <cell border="none" cell-span="14" line-span="1"> <text>(a) The strengths of the student?</text> </cell> <cell border="left" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <radio alias="considerations-stdStrengths" value="YES" /> </cell> <cell border="none" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <radio alias="considerations-stdStrengths" value="NO" /> </cell> </line> <line border="none"> <cell border="none" cell-span="14" line-span="1"> <text>(b) The concerns of the parents for enhancing the education of their student?</text> </cell> <cell border="left" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <radio alias="considerations-prntConcerns" value="YES" /> </cell> <cell border="none" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <radio alias="considerations-prntConcerns" value="NO" /> </cell> </line> <line border="none"> <cell border="none" cell-span="14" line-span="1"> <text>(c) The results of the initial or most recent evaluation of the student?</text> </cell> <cell border="left" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <radio alias="considerations-evalResults" value="YES" /> </cell> <cell border="none" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <radio alias="considerations-evalResults" value="NO" /> </cell> </line> <line border="none"> <cell border="bottom" cell-span="14" line-span="1"> <text>(d) The academic, developmental and functional needs of the student?</text> </cell> <cell border="left,bottom" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <radio alias="considerations-stdNeeds" value="YES" /> </cell> <cell border="bottom" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <radio alias="considerations-stdNeeds" value="NO" /> </cell> </line> <line border="none"> <cell border="bottom" cell-span="14" line-span="1"> <text>Does the student''s behavior impede his/her learning or that of others?</text> </cell> <cell border="left,bottom" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <radio alias="considerations-behavior" value="YES" /> </cell> <cell border="bottom" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <radio alias="considerations-behavior" value="NO" /> </cell> <cell border="left,bottom" cell-span="10" line-span="1" vertical-align="top"> <text>If yes, the IEP team must consider the use of positive behavioral interventions and supports and other strategies to address the behavior.</text> </cell> </line> <line border="none"> <cell border="none" cell-span="14" line-span="1"> <text>Is the student blind or visually impaired?</text> </cell> <cell border="left" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <radio alias="considerations-blind" value="YES" /> </cell> <cell border="none" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <radio alias="considerations-blind" value="NO" /> </cell> <cell border="left,bottom" cell-span="10" line-span="2" vertical-align="top"> <text /> </cell> </line> <line border="none"> <cell border="bottom" cell-span="14" line-span="1"> <text>If yes, does the student need instruction in Braille or the use of Braille?</text> </cell> <cell border="left,bottom" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <radio alias="considerations-braille" value="YES" /> </cell> <cell border="bottom" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <radio alias="considerations-braille" value="NO" /> </cell> </line> <line border="none"> <cell border="bottom" cell-span="14" line-span="1"> <text>Does the student have communication needs that could impede his/her learning?</text> </cell> <cell border="left,bottom" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <radio alias="considerations-comm" value="YES" /> </cell> <cell border="bottom" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <radio alias="considerations-comm" value="NO" /> </cell> <cell border="left,bottom" cell-span="10" line-span="1" vertical-align="top"> <text>If yes, the IEP team must address communication needs.</text> </cell> </line> <line border="none"> <cell border="bottom" cell-span="14" line-span="1"> <text>Is the student deaf or hard of hearing?</text> </cell> <cell border="left,bottom" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <radio alias="considerations-deaf" value="YES" /> </cell> <cell border="bottom" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <radio alias="considerations-deaf" value="NO" /> </cell> <cell border="left,bottom" cell-span="10" line-span="1" vertical-align="top"> <text>If yes, the IEP team must consider the student''s language and communication needs, opportunities for direct communications with peers and professional personnel in the student''s language and communication mode, academic level, and full range of needs, including opportunities for direct instruction in the student''s language and communication mode.</text> </cell> </line> <line border="none"> <cell border="bottom" cell-span="14" line-span="1"> <text>Did the IEP team consider whether the student needs assistive technology device(s) and service(s)?</text> </cell> <cell border="left,bottom" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <radio alias="considerations-tech" value="YES" /> </cell> <cell border="bottom" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <radio alias="considerations-tech" value="NO" /> </cell> <cell border="left,bottom" cell-span="10" line-span="1" vertical-align="top"> <text>If no, the IEP team must consider whether the student needs assistive technology device(s) and service(s).</text> </cell> </line> <line border="none"> <cell border="bottom" cell-span="14" line-span="1"> <text>Does this student have a Personal Literacy Plan (PLP)?</text> </cell> <cell border="left,bottom" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <radio alias="considerations-plp" value="YES" /> </cell> <cell border="bottom" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <radio alias="considerations-plp" value="NO" /> </cell> <cell border="left,bottom" cell-span="10" line-span="1" vertical-align="top"> <text>If yes, the the student''s short term objectives must be aligned with the student''s PLP.</text> </cell> </line> <line border="none"> <cell border="none" cell-span="14" line-span="1"> <text>Does this student have an Individual Learning Plan (ILP)?</text> </cell> <cell border="left" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <radio alias="considerations-ilp" value="YES" /> </cell> <cell border="none" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <radio alias="considerations-ilp" value="NO" /> </cell> <cell border="left" cell-span="10" line-span="1" vertical-align="top"> <text>If yes, the the student''s short term objectives must be aligned with the student''s ILP.</text> </cell> </line> </block> </row> <include context="iep.esl" read-only="true"/> <row> <block> <line align="center" border="bottom" shaded="true"> <text bold="true" font-size="large">Extended School Year Services</text> </line> <line border="none"> <text>Does the Student require Extended School Year (ESY) services?</text> </line> <line border="none"> <radio alias="considerations-esy" value="true" /> <text>Yes. ESY services will be provided for this student and are described in the special education programs and services, related services, supplementary aids and services, program modification and supports for school personnel sections of this IEP.</text> </line> <line border="none"> <radio alias="considerations-esy" value="false" /> <text>No.</text> </line> </block> </row> </tab> <tab name="Services/Placement"> <row> <block> <line align="center" border="bottom" shaded="true"> <text bold="true" font-size="large">Services</text> </line> <line border="none"> <spacer height="10" /> </line> <line align="center" border="none"> <text bold="true" font-size="medium">Special Education</text> </line> <line border="none"> <cell border="none" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <embedded-list detail-context="iepform.service.sped" extended-dictionary-oid="ddxRiIep" id="services-a" popup-height="450" popup-width="850" relationship="relIepIsvOid" selection-type="multiple"> <system-value field="isvStdOID" source="ancestor" value="iepStdOID" /> <system-value field="isvServiceMode" source="constant" value="Special Education" /> <field id="isvGoalView" sort="true" /> <field alias="service-description" /> <field id="isvProvider" /> <field alias="frequency-hours" /> <field alias="frequency-days" /> <field alias="frequency-weeks" /> <field id="isvStartDate" /> <field id="isvEndDate" /> <field alias="service-location-regular" /> <field alias="service-location-other" /> <field alias="service-loc-description" /> <filter connector="and" field="isvServiceMode" value="yesbutexited" /> <text>Yes, but exited prior to referral to Part B</text> </line> <line border="none"> <radio alias="riec-38d-early-intervention" value="NA" /> <text>Blank</text> </line> <line </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="false"> <text bold="true" font-size="medium">If the effective date of the child''s original IEP (date first service began) was not on or before the child''s 3rd birthday, why?</text> </line> <line border="none"> <radio alias="riec-38d-iep-after-3rd" value="late" /> <text>Late referral/moved into district late (less than 90 days before 3rd UPDATE VIEW_TEMPLATE SET VWT_VIEW_DEFINITION = '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <template> <tab name="Details"> <row show-border="false"> <block> <line> <cell> <text><![CDATA[<script language="Javascript">
/* * Onload. */ $(function() { updateDynamicForm("service-dates"); }); </script><![CDATA-END]></text> </cell> </line> </block> </row> <row> <column> <property id="isvProvider" label-short="true" /> value="true" /> </picklist> </property> </column> <column> <property id="isvStartDate" label-short="false" /> <property alias="service-date-pause" label-short="false" /> <property alias="service-location-other" label-display="left" label="Other" /> <property alias="service-loc-description" label-short="false" rows="1" /> <property alias="service-school-code" label-short="false" rows="1" /> </group> </column> </row> <row> <column> <property id="isvMedReimbInd" label-short="false" /> <property id="isvSerDelvCode" label-short="false" /> </column> </row> </tab> <tab name="Sped&nbsp;Census"> <row> <block> <line border="none"> <text font-size="medium">The fields below may be left blank. If blank, the values under ''Rhode Island Special Education Census'' on the IEP''s Attributes tab will be used in the Services Census extract.</text> </line> </block> </row> <row> <column> <property alias="service-program-continuum" label-short="false" /> <property alias="service-cost-center" label-short="false" /> <property alias="service-tuition" label-short="false" /> <property alias="service-account-number" label-short="false" /> <property alias="service-end-reason" label-short="false" /> </column> </row> <row> <block> <line border="none"> <text font-size="medium">The fields below are set automatically by the Services Census.</text> </line> </block> </row> <row> <column> <property alias="service-adjusted-start-date" label-short="false" /> <property alias="service-adjusted-end-date" label-short="false" /> <property alias="service-in-last-state-report" label-short="false" /> <property alias="service-adjustment-reason" label-short="false" /> </column> </row> </tab> </template>' WHERE VWT_OID = 'vwtX2IsvRIsped' AND (VWT_CUSTOM_IND <> '1' OR VWT_CUSTOM_IND IS NULL);
